Package events

Class Event

java.lang.Object
events.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Concert, Cycle, Dance, TheaterPlay
public abstract class Event
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This is an abstract class that allow us to define an event

      Parameters:
      title - string with the title of the event
      author - String with the author of the event
      director - string that contains the director of the event
      description - string with a short description of the event
